It is caused by GUI to get the columns of data set handle, but I don't know why it will happen when user click the report. Reassign to GUI for investigation.

We have agreed the DatasetManger is part of data team.
Loos the DataSetUIUtil provides by data team.
This is not the DataSetManager error, it is the error of refreshment. Please debug it first to know the real reason.

The exception happens in data team's code.
I do believe you need check the reason of exception at first.
When a new Adapter project is imported, this bug will fix.

Please refer to bug136228. To let user know that there is an error in defined dataset, an exception will be thrown out, but only once.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 136228 ***
